author: M W
comment: I accidentally set the lock screen with a task that locked my phone with a key I could not remember. I remotely installed this and used my watch to launch the antidote task. Thanks. Did exactly what I hoped it would.
title: Saved my night

author: Francisco Moreno
comment: I like the easy way of executing tasks on the phone from my wear but I think a few minor improvements are welcome. First I would like to bookmark tasks in order to execute them faster, now it's just an alphabetic list of the tasks. This could be more efficient. Second I would like the app to close itself after executing a task, now it just returns to the list of tasks. I thinks these are minor improvements that would make the experience more refined, something I expect of a paid app. Nice job!
title: Easy to use but can use improvements

author: Jenny Hawkins
comment: Nice simple little app that fits right in with the Wear aesthetics. Straight forward configurations, and highly responsive dev.
title: Just what I was looking for

author: A K
comment: Would be nice to have be able to build a specific list of Tasker tasks just for the watch.
title: Good

author: Francesco Quacquarelli
comment: Tiny, but functional. It would be nice to launch tasks directly without entering into the app... Thanks anyway
title: Perfect

author: Alex Kubacki
comment: Would be nice if this was formatted better for the Moto360.
title: Close

author: Pasquale J. Festa
comment: This is letting me bypass the whole IFTTT/Pushbullet workaround I've been using to fire Tasks on my Phone from my Watch. Only a couple of issues I noticed: 1. Firing a Task automatically launches the Tasker for Wear app on the phone. IT'd be nice if it didn't do that - I have been using a wait/kill stipulation to get it to leave though. 2. When I created a new Project I was getting an error. I had to play around and it fixed itself, so sometimes it seems a little unstable. Nonetheless, this is awesome.  Updated to 5 Stars. Dev appreciated feedback and implemented it in to the application quickly. Great support!

reply.author: Ajio
reply.content:
Thank you for a review.
I will fix 2 problems. Please wait for a few days.
----------------------------------------------------------
Thank you for updating a review.
Please tell me by a review or an email anytime if there is a new idea again

title: Awesome, but a little rough.

author: Casen
comment: It just shows a blank white screen
title: On the watch app...
